Required functionality: trainees can answer a survey once at the beginning of the course and once at the end. At the end of the course, they can see their own progress (survey results) and those of the whole class.

Rewrite the required functionality above as user stories. Write as many user stories as are necessary to communicate all the requirements hidden in the text above.

Here are a few user stories that cover the required functionality:

1. As a trainee, I want to be able to access a survey at the beginning of the course, so that I can provide my initial feedback and opinions.
2. As a trainee, I want to be able to access the same survey at the end of the course, so that I can provide my final feedback and opinions.
3. As a trainee, I want to be able to see my progress over the course of the training, so that I can track my own improvement and identify areas for further development.
4. As a trainee, I want to be able to compare my end-of-course survey results with my initial survey results, so that I can see how my opinions and attitudes have changed over time.
5. As a trainee, I want to be able to view the survey results of the entire class at the end of the course, so that I can compare my progress with that of my peers and see the overall performance of the group.
6. As an instructor, I want to be able to collect survey responses from trainees at the beginning and end of the course, so that I can track their progress and evaluate the effectiveness of the training program.
7. As an instructor, I want to be able to view the survey results of individual trainees, so that I can provide personalized feedback and support.
8. As an instructor, I want to be able to view the survey results of the entire class, so that I can evaluate the overall effectiveness of the training program and identify areas for improvement.
